TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit EntryPointNotFoundException extends System.TypeLoadException

summary.span: 當試著載入類別卻因沒有進入方法而告失敗時，所擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when an attempt to load a class fails due to the absence of an entry method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Common language runtime 無法載入組件，因為無法識別組件的進入點時，會擲回例外狀況。An exception is thrown when the common language runtime is unable to load an assembly because it cannot identify the assembly's entry point. 在下列情況下，可能會擲回這個例外狀況：This exception can be thrown under the following conditions: - Common language runtime 會找不到應用程式進入點 (通常`Main`方法) 中執行的組件。The common language runtime is unable to locate an application entry point (typically a `Main` method) in an executable assembly. 應用程式進入點必須是全域或`static`具有無參數或做為其唯一參數的字串陣列的方法。The application entry point must be a global or `static` method that has either no parameters or a string array as its only parameter. 進入點可以傳回`void`，它可以傳回或結束代碼。The entry point can return `void`, or it can return an or exit code. 應用程式組件不能定義一個以上的進入點。An application assembly cannot define more than one entry point. - 無法解析 Windows DLL 中的函式呼叫，因為找不到函式。The call to a function in a Windows DLL cannot be resolved because the function cannot be found. 在下列範例中，因為 User32.dll 不包含名為函式會擲回例外狀況`GetMyNumber`。In the following example, an exception is thrown because User32.dll does not include a function named `GetMyNumber`. [!code-csharp[System.EntryPointNotFoundException.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.entrypointnotfoundexception.class/cs/nofunction1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.EntryPointNotFoundException.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.entrypointnotfoundexception.class/vb/nofunction1.vb#1)] - 無法解析 Windows DLL 中的函式呼叫，因為在方法呼叫中使用的名稱不符合組件中找到的名稱。The call to a function in a Windows DLL cannot be resolved because the name used in the method call does not match a name found in the assembly. 通常，這是因為欄位會以隱含或明確設定為`true`、 所呼叫的方法包含一或多個字串參數，而且使用 ANSI 和 Unicode 版本和方法呼叫中使用的名稱並不會對應至這個 ANSI 或 Unicode 版本的名稱。Frequently, this occurs because the field is either implicitly or explicitly set to `true`, the called method includes one or more string parameters and has both an ANSI and a Unicode version, and the name used in the method call does not correspond to the name of this ANSI or Unicode version. 下列範例將進行示範，嘗試呼叫 Windows `MessageBox` User32.dll 中的函式。The following example provides an illustration by attempting to call the Windows `MessageBox` function in User32.dll. 因為指定的第一個方法定義封送處理字串，common language 會尋找函式，寬字元版本`MessageBoxW`，而不是在方法呼叫時，所使用的名稱`MessageBox`。Because the first method definition specifies for string marshaling, the common language looks for the wide-character version of the function, `MessageBoxW`, instead of the name used in the method call, `MessageBox`. 第二個方法定義修正此問題，藉由呼叫`MessageBoxW`而不是`MessageBox`函式。The second method definition corrects this problem by calling the `MessageBoxW` instead of the `MessageBox` function. [!code-csharp[System.EntryPointNotFoundException.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.entrypointnotfoundexception.class/cs/badcall1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.EntryPointNotFoundException.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.entrypointnotfoundexception.class/vb/badcall1.vb#2)] - 您嘗試在動態連結程式庫呼叫的函式，由其簡單的名稱，而不是其裝飾的名稱。You are trying to call a function in a dynamic link library by its simple name rather than its decorated name. 通常，c + + 編譯器會產生 DLL 函式的裝飾的名稱。Typically, the C++ compiler generates a decorated name for DLL functions. 例如，下列 c + + 程式碼會定義名為函式`Double`名為 TestDll.dll 文件庫中。For example, the following C++ code defines a function named `Double` in a library named TestDll.dll. [!code-cpp[System.EntryPointNotFoundException.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.entrypointnotfoundexception.class/cpp/testdll.cpp#6)] 下列範例中的程式碼嘗試呼叫函式，當會擲回例外狀況，因為`Double`找不到函式。When the code in the following example tries to call the function, an exception is thrown because the `Double` function cannot be found. [!code-csharp[System.EntryPointNotFoundException.Class#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.entrypointnotfoundexception.class/cs/mangle1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.EntryPointNotFoundException.Class#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.entrypointnotfoundexception.class/vb/mangle1.vb#7)] 不過，如果呼叫的函式是以其裝飾的名稱 (在此情況下， `?Double@@YAHH@Z`)，函式呼叫成功，如下列範例所示。However, if the function is called by using its decorated name (in this case, `?Double@@YAHH@Z`), the function call succeeds, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.EntryPointNotFoundException.Class#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.entrypointnotfoundexception.class/cs/mangle2.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.EntryPointNotFoundException.Class#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.entrypointnotfoundexception.class/vb/mangle2.vb#8)] 您可以找到使用 Dumpbin.exe 等公用程式 dll 匯出的函式的裝飾的名稱。You can find the decorated names of functions exported by a DLL by using a utility such as Dumpbin.exe. - 您嘗試在受管理組件中呼叫的方法，就好像之 unmanaged 動態連結程式庫。You are attempting to call a method in a managed assembly as if it were an unmanaged dynamic link library. 若要查看此動作，編譯組件名為 StringUtilities.dll 下列的範例。To see this in action, compile the following example to an assembly named StringUtilities.dll. [!code-csharp[System.EntryPointNotFoundException.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.entrypointnotfoundexception.class/cs/stringutilities.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.EntryPointNotFoundException.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.entrypointnotfoundexception.class/vb/stringutilities.vb#3)] 然後編譯並執行下列的範例中，嘗試呼叫`StringUtilities.SayGoodMorning`StringUtilities.dll 動態連結程式庫中的方法就好像 unmanaged 程式碼。Then compile and execute the following example, which attempts to call the `StringUtilities.SayGoodMorning` method in the StringUtilities.dll dynamic link library as if it were unmanaged code. 結果是例外狀況。The result is an exception. [!code-csharp[System.EntryPointNotFoundException.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.entrypointnotfoundexception.class/cs/importassembly1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.EntryPointNotFoundException.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.entrypointnotfoundexception.class/vb/importassembly1.vb#4)] 若要消除例外狀況，將參考加入至 managed 組件及存取`StringUtilities.SayGoodMorning`方法就像存取任何其他方法在 managed 程式碼，如下列範例會執行。To eliminate the exception, add a reference to the managed assembly and access the `StringUtilities.SayGoodMorning` method just as you would access any other method in managed code, as the following example does. [!code-csharp[System.EntryPointNotFoundException.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.entrypointnotfoundexception.class/cs/fiximportassembly1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.EntryPointNotFoundException.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.entrypointnotfoundexception.class/vb/fiximportassembly1.vb#5)] - 您嘗試在 COM DLL 中呼叫的方法，就好像 Windows DLL。You are trying to call a method in a COM DLL as if it were a Windows DLL. 若要存取 COM DLL，請選取**加入參考**選項以將參考加入專案，然後選取 [從類型程式庫的 Visual Studio 中**COM** ] 索引標籤。To access a COM DLL, select the **Add Reference** option in Visual Studio to add a reference to the project, and then select the type library from the **COM** tab. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructors.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化屬性的新執行個體的系統提供的訊息描述錯誤，例如 「 進入點已找不到。 」This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Entry point was not found." 此訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。This message takes into account the current system culture. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。The localized error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

param.name: message
param.span: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

span.span: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `message` 的內容必須能讓人了解。The content of `message` is intended to be understood by humans. 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||錯誤訊息字串。The error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed
Protected Sub New (info As SerializationInfo, context As StreamingContext)

param.name: info
param.span: 存放序列物件資料的物件。

span.span: The object that holds the serialized object data.

param.name: context
param.span: 關於來源或目的端的內容資訊。

span.span: The contextual information about the source or destination.

summary.span: 使用序列化資料，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception inner) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, inner As Exception)

param.name: message
param.span: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

span.span: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

param.name: inner
param.span: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 inner 參數不是 Null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )，則會在處理內部例外狀況的 區塊中引發目前的例外狀況。

span.span: If the inner parameter is not a null reference ( in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `Nothing` 屬性不提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||內部例外狀況參考。The inner exception reference.| ||錯誤訊息字串。The error message string.|
